name: Kobold Swiftblade
description: The Kobold Swiftblade is a small humanoid creature known for its agility and lethal combat skills. Dressed in leather armor, it excels in both melee and ranged attacks with its scimitar and hand crossbow.
memorable: Benefits from Pack Tactics for deadly coordinated attacks, while being vulnerable to bright light.
goals: Ambush and flank opponents, utilize stealth and cunning tactics.
relations: Often found in groups, working alongside other kobolds or cunning allies.
environment: Commonly situated in dungeons, caves, or areas where they can utilize their stealth.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for effective use of weapons and excellent Stealth.
weaknesses: Sunlight Sensitivity causes disadvantage on attacks in bright light.
attacks: Can dual-wield scimitars or fire from a hand crossbow, utilizing both slashing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics, granting advantage on attack rolls when allies are near.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light.
skills: A high Stealth score of 16 enables effective hiding and ambushing strategies.
additional_information: Can move quickly without provoking opportunity attacks.
Chooses whether to trigger traps when moving.
Combines slashing and poison damage in attacks.
test_queries: small agile kobold with flexible movement
cunning kobold that uses Pack Tactics
kobold fighter that excels in ambushes
kobold with scimitar and hand crossbow
sneaky small humanoid with sunlight sensitivity
